data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Muktsar, Punjab, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Muktsar, Punjab, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Muktsar, Punjab, India.

data.section_summary: On average, 190 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Muktsar, Punjab, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Muktsar, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: the county of Muktsar has (about) 9,921 people who know Jesus, 10,943 people who know about him culturally, and 881,036 people who are far from Jesus.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Arain (Sikh traditions) people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Arain (Sikh traditions) people.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 9,921 believers in Muktsar, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Muktsar to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.section_summary:
the county of Muktsar, Punjab, India has a population of 901,900.

We estimate Muktsar has 9,921 people who might know Jesus, 10,943 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 881,036 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Muktsar, Punjab, India.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.
